meanings.definition: A small bone found in the body of a fish.
meanings.sent1: The cat choked on a fishbone.
meanings.sent2: She carefully removed the fishbone from the cooked fish.
meanings.sent3: The fishbone decided to take a swim in the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The path through the forest resembled a fishbone, twisting and turning.
meanings.sent5: The fishbone stuck in his throat like a stubborn obstacle.

meanings.definition: A structure or pattern resembling the shape of a fishbone.
meanings.sent1: The cracks on the wall formed a fishbone pattern.
meanings.sent2: The fishbone design on the floor added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The fishbone-shaped cloud made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a fishbone braid, looking elegant.
meanings.sent5: The fishbone structure of the building stood out among the rest.
